info_install_remove_file: For security reasons, please remove this file from your server.
info_reset_email_send: New password generated. An email was sent to your email address.
info_fallback_used: Selected language is not available for system alerts.
warning_no_database_initialized: There is currently no database initialized. Think to install Snipeg first.
error_uploaded_file_not_found: Uploaded file not found in server.
error_not_enough_right: You are not allowed to do this action.
error_email_is_not_a_valid_email: Email is not a valid email address.
error_lang_unvailable: Selected language is unreachable. Default language set.
error_no_lang_avaible: No one language can be found. Checked if Snipeg is properly installed.
error_theme_unvailable: Selected theme is unreachable. Default theme set.
error_no_theme_avaible: No one theme can be found. Checked if Snipeg is properly installed.
error_user_locked: You were locked. Contact your admin in order to try to fix it.
error_avatar_oversized: Uploaded file is oversized, please trying with a smaller picture.
error_account_reset: No matching found for this username / email.
error_add_snippet: An error occurred. The snippet was not added.
